amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the coordination of rights under the Uniformed Services Employment and Reemployment Rights Act of 1994 with the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3164 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3164 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S6719-6721) To express the sense of the Senate on the coordination of rights under the Uniformed Services Employment and Reemployment Rights Act of 1994 with the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3164 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3164 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Gregg.
